data.name: AddSvcRefDlg_DefaultDialogTitle
data.value: Add Service Reference
data.comment: Title for the "Add Service Reference" dialog

data.name: CodeGenerator_UnableToGetCodeDomProvider
data.value: Unable to find a code generator (CodeDomProvider).

data.name: Configuration_CantSaveTemporaryConfigurations
data.value: Configuration could not be saved. Make sure the configuration file exists and can be edited.

data.name: Configuration_IVsProjectSpecialFilesNotSupported
data.value: The current project does not support configuration files.

data.name: AddSvcRefDlg_NoServicesFoundInSolution
data.value: No services found in the solution.

data.name: AddSvcRefDlg_ErrorOnOK
data.value: There was an error downloading metadata from the address. Please verify that you have entered a valid address.

data.name: AddSvcRefDlg_ServicesFoundAtUrl_2Args
data.value: {0} service(s) found at address '{1}'.
data.comment: {0} = count, {1} = URL where the services were found

data.name: AddSvcRefDlg_ServicesFoundInSolution_1Arg
data.value: {0} service(s) found in the solution.

data.name: Configuration_OnlyRootItemIdSupported
data.value: It is only possible to access the default (ITEMID_ROOT) configuration file.

data.name: ReferenceGroup_InvalidNamespace
data.value: '{0}' is not a valid namespace for the service reference.

data.name: ReferenceGroup_NamespaceConflictsOther
data.value: Cannot create a service reference with namespace '{0}' because the name is already in use by an existing service reference, folder or file.

data.name: ReferenceGroup_AddMultipleReference
data.value: Unable to add a new reference. One or more references already exists or the 'Metadata' section is not empty in the .svcmap file. Edit the .svcmap file and clear all the entries from the 'Metadata' section.

data.name: ReferenceGroup_NamespaceCantBeEmpty
data.value: A namespace needs to be specified for this service reference.

data.name: ReferenceGroup_InvalidName
data.value: {0}' is not a valid name for a service reference.

data.name: ReferenceGroup_NameCantBeEmpty
data.value: Empty string is not a valid name for a reference group.

data.name: ReferenceGroup_NameConflictsOther
data.value: Cannot create a reference group named '{0}' because the name is already being used by an existing reference group, folder or file.

data.name: ReferenceGroup_NameCantStartEndWithSpace
data.value: Cannot create a reference group with namespace or name with leading or trailing whitespace characters.

data.name: ReferenceGroup_NotFoundThroughPath
data.value: The .svcmap file cannot be found. It may have been moved or deleted. To generate a new .svcmap file, delete the service reference and add it again.

data.name: ReferenceGroup_NotSupportedInCurrentProject
data.value: The current project does not support service references. To enable Windows Communication Foundation support, change the target version of the Microsoft .NET Framework.

data.name: ReferenceGroup_DeleteFailedConfigurationError
data.value: The configuration for the service reference could not be deleted due to the following issue: {0}

data.name: ReferenceGroup_UpdateFailedConfigurationError
data.value: The configuration for the service reference could not be updated due to the following issue: {0}

data.name: ReferenceGroup_AddFailedConfigurationError
data.value: The configuration for the service reference could not be added due to the following issue: {0}

data.name: AddSvcRefDlg_NothingSelectedOnGo
data.value: Please enter the address for a service.

data.name: AddSvcRefDlg_Error_DiscoverUrl_1Arg
data.value: An error occurred while attempting to find services at '{0}'.

data.name: AddSvcRefDlg_Error_ServicesInSolution
data.value: An error occurred while searching for services in the solution.

data.name: AddSvcRefDlg_Error_StartService_1Arg1
data.value: An error occurred while attempting to start services at '{0}'".

data.name: AddSvcRefDlg_PleaseWait
data.value: Please wait for service information to be downloaded or click Stop.

data.name: ReferenceGroup_FailedToGetReferencedAssembliesFromProject
data.value: Cannot get referenced assemblies from the project system.

data.name: ReferenceGroup_SvcMapFileIsMissing
data.value: The service reference is invalid, because the .svcmap file ('{0}') cannot be found. It may have been moved, deleted or excluded from the project. To generate a new .svcmap file, delete the service reference and add it again.

data.name: ReferenceGroup_SvcMapFileBadFormat
data.value: The service reference is invalid. The .svcmap file ('{0}') cannot be loaded. It may be corrupted or in a bad format: {1}

data.name: AddSvcRegDlg_ShowErrorDetails
data.value: (Details)
data.comment: This is the text for a link to additional error information.

data.name: AddSvcRefDlg_OPSelectContract
data.value: Select a service contract to view its operations.
data.comment: This is the message displayed when user selects non-contract nodes.

data.name: CSRDlg_Title
data.value: Service Reference Settings

data.name: CSRDlg_CustomType
data.value: ( Custom )

data.name: CSRDlg_AssemblyNotFoundError
data.value: The assembly '{0}' could not be found.

data.name: CSRDlg_NullURL
data.value: Address should be a valid non-empty URL.
data.comment: Error message to display when user enters empty URL in the address change text box

data.name: AddSvcRefDlg_ServicesFound_1Arg
data.value: {0} service(s) found.

data.name: Err_UserCancelled
data.value: The operation was cancelled.

data.name: UpdateDialog_Title_1Arg
data.value: Updating Service Reference '{0}'

data.name: Status_UpdateComplete
data.value: Service reference update complete.

data.name: Status_GeneratingProxy
data.value: Generating service reference client code...

data.name: Status_GeneratingProxyComplete
data.value: Generation of service reference client code complete.

data.name: Status_StartUpdate_1Arg
data.value: Updating service reference '{0}'...

data.name: Status_UpdatingConfig
data.value: Updating configuration...

data.name: Status_UpdatingConfigComplete
data.value: Configuration update complete.

data.name: Status_UpdateCancelled
data.value: Service reference update was cancelled.

data.name: Status_UpdateFailed
data.value: Service reference update failed.

data.name: Status_AddServiceComplete
data.value: Add service reference complete.

data.name: Status_AddServiceFailed
data.value: Add service reference failed.

data.name: Status_StartAddService_1Arg
data.value: Creating new service reference to '{0}'...

data.name: CSRDlg_NoAssemblySelected
data.value: No assembly is selected.

data.name: ReferenceGroup_AsyncOpPending
data.value: The requested operation is not valid while an asynchronous operation is in progress.

data.name: CSRDlg_MultipleURL
data.value: Multiple addresses (editable in .svcmap file)

data.name: AddSvcRefDlg_ContractsFoundAtUrl_2Args
data.value: {0} contract(s) found at address '{1}'.
data.comment: {0} = count, {1} = URL where the contracts were found

data.name: AddSvcRefDlg_Error_CantCreateTempFile
data.value: Unable to create temporary configuration file for downloading service information.

data.name: ConfigurationFileOpenedInIncompatibleEditor
data.value: The file is already opened in an incompatible editor.

data.name: Status_DownloadingMetadata
data.value: Downloading service information...

data.name: AddSvcRefDlg_Error_ExistingRefGroupNotSupported
data.value: The current version of the software does not support adding a service reference to an existing service reference group.

data.name: Discovery_ErrorBuildSolution
data.value: If the service is defined in the current solution, try building the solution and adding the service reference again.

data.name: ReferenceGroup_MismatchBeginEndBatch
data.value: Mismatching Begin/EndBatch calls. You have called EndBatch more times than BeginBatch.

data.name: SingleFileGenerator_FailedToGenerateTypes_1Arg
data.value: Failed to generate code for the service reference '{0}'. Please check other error and warning messages for details.
